name: Karonoid
description:
Karonoid (PC version)

Player control little creature Karo with the "Paddle shield" use for bouncing the balls to break the bricks. Colored bricks may contain powerups and more ball.

Control

Movements: Arrow keys or WASD

Shield-Aim: Shield will aim at pointer if it is stays in the game scene, you can also rotate the shield around with Z and X keys but the mouse pointer must be outside of the game scene to do this.

Press P key to pause when the game is running, and use it to unpause when the game is pausing ;)

Credits
